sense.name: A painful emotion resulting from an awareness of inadequacy or guilt.
sense.examples: One mistake brought shame to his family. He suffered the shame of prison. His shame will be his redemption.

sense.name: An unfortunate development.
sense.commentary: SHAME[+event] Note: usually expressed as "a shame."
sense.examples: It was a shame that she couldn't come. It was such a shame that he couldn't do it.
